archimate:Requirement.name: SG.2.1.3a: a) outlining the way in which an information security programme will enable the organisation to maintain its strategic direction (e.g. by responding to the evolving threat landscape)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
